text: Hini na nina bakholwayo, yibani ngabancedisi baka-Allah, njengangoko u’Isâ, unyana kaMaryam wathi kubafundi bakhe: “Ngoobani na abancedisi bam kuAllâh?” Abafundi bathi: “Thina singabo abancedisi baka-Allah.” Ke kaloku iqela (elithile) kuBantwana bakwaSirayeli laya alakholwa. Thina ke Sancedisa abo bakholwayo ngokuchasene neentshaba zabo, baza baba nolongamelo
